text: This page contains general information about Google's Material Design implementations. == Notes == As of , unless indicated, all of the components listed below conform to the new Material Design specifications. == Implemented web components (2018 specifications) == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! colspan="2"|Components ! Polymer Project ! AngularJS Material ! Materialize ! Material-UI ! ! Material Components for the web |- | rowspan="2" | App bars | App bars: bottom | | | | | | |- | App bars: top (formerly known as toolbar in the former specifications) | | | | | | |- |
